title: Does NCDOT plan to landscape the new speed control median on Waltmoor Drive like all the others in the area?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. Thanks for using MyReporter.com!  Yes. Here's a link to a city update on the projec: http://www.wilmingtonnc.gov/Home/News/tabid/429/ItemID/573/View/Details/Default.aspx
